short_summary: The department is seeking the following materials:
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice for Cable, Special Purpose, Electrical

## Solicitation Information

* Title (English): NSN 6145-01-5933291, Cable, special purpose, electrical
* Title (French): NSN 6145-01-5933291, Câble électrique, usage spécial
* Solicitation Number: W8482-230286/A
* Amendment Number: 3
* Publication Date: February 22, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: April 11, 2023, 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: March 30, 2023

## Procurement Details

* Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Katharine Barker
	+ Email: [Katharine.Barker2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Katharine.Barker2@forces.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: 819-939-4337
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: World, Canada
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia, Nova Scotia

## Tender Requirements

The Department of National Defence is seeking a supplier to provide special purpose electrical cables for delivery to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. The cables must meet the following specifications:

* GSIN: N6145
* NSN: 01-5933291
* Part Number: EPD-DND-21536
* Quantity: 1000 items
* Unit of Issue: MR

Bidders must provide prices in Canadian dollars. Equivalent or substitute products must be identified with brand name, model, and/or part number and NCAGE.

## Documents

The tender documents, including the request for proposal and amendments, are available on the Canadabuys website.

## Language

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Note

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Tender submissions in foreign currency will be rejected.  Avaibale sourcing is on a first come first served basis with regards to dispatching order and relations with wholsalers. 
 

You may add more detail or information to the above document to complete the tender notice content. For example, details for company profile, document sign off and many other things, I assume you know what those are, please add them as per your understanding
